text: Marshal of the Royal Air Force Sir Peter Robin Harding, (2 December 1933 â€“ 19 August 2021) was a Royal Air Force officer. He was a bomber pilot in the 1950s. He became Chief of the Air Staff in 1988. He became Chief of the Defence Staff in December 1992. Harding died on 19 August 2021, aged 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British aviators Category:British military people Category:People from the London Borough of Lambeth
